PenmuxModule.Name: ScriptLog
PenmuxModule.Description: Module to log terminal input / output to files (using util/linux script)

Option.Name: LogExisting
Option.Description: If enabled all existing panes will start logging

Option.Name: Name
Option.Description: Logfile name to use. All tmux placeholders can be used (ae. #W, #S, etc.)

Option.Name: LogPenmuxSessionDir
Option.Description: Log to penmux session directory if set. If not set use LogDir

Option.Name: LogDir
Option.Description: Directory to store logfiles. All tmux placeholders can be used (ae. #W, #S, etc.)

Consumes.Name: SessionDir
Consumes.Description: The final session directory. Can be used by other modules to store data.
